description: This file defines utility functions for path normalization and directory filtering within a namespace 'path_utils'. It includes functions to normalize paths, check if a path is within a base directory, and get the current working directory, with some global flags controlling behavior.

methods.name: normalize_path
methods.description: Converts a given path to an absolute, normalized path with symlinks resolved, handling relative paths based on current working directory.

methods.name: is_within_directory
methods.description: Checks if a given path is within or equal to a specified base directory, considering system paths and respecting the global disable flag.

methods.name: get_current_directory
methods.description: Returns the current working directory as a string.
